issue.title: Stopwatch.StartStopReset test is flaky on windows

content.raw:
Yeah, I think we can ignore those weird measurements that appeared to satisfy the expectation because it was reading the timer twice and getting different values. It makes more sense now

~~~
59: [ RUN      ] Stopwatch.StartStopReset
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <A4-28 92-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-CA 9A-3B 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedRunTime() 999434 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(1000) 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <D4-D0 94-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-CA 9A-3B 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedRunTime() 999608 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(1000) 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <1A-B4 98-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-CA 9A-3B 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedStopTime() 999863 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(1000) 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <40-8A 2E-77 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-94 35-77 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedRunTime() 1999538 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(2000) 2000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <66-5A 99-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-CA 9A-3B 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedRunTime() 999905 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(1000) 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <6F-E1 99-3B 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-CA 9A-3B 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedStopTime() 999940 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(1000) 1000000 us
59: 
59: D:\Jenkins\workspace\ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64\ws\ign-math\src\Stopwatch_TEST.cc(44): error: Expected: (_duration1) >= (_duration2), actual: 8-byte object <6F-A1 34-77 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-94 35-77 00-00 00-00>
59: _time.ElapsedRunTime() 1999937 us >= std::chrono::milliseconds(2000) 2000000 us
59: 
59: [  FAILED  ] Stopwatch.StartStopReset (6000 ms)
